member.name: IActionProgressDialog.Initialize
member.summary: Provides details about the action progress dialog.

param.name: flags
param.para: Use the default progress dialog behavior.
Use a modal window for the dialog.
Do not display a minimize button.

member.param: The title of the progress dialog.
The string displayed when a user closes the dialog before completion.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IActionProgressDialog.Stop
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IActionProgressDialog
member.summary: Exposes methods that initialize and stop a progress dialog.
